verification.task_description: You must prove that you are not a robot to become a part of us. Some robots have become so sophisticated that it's hard to distinguish them from real humans. The higher the level of human verification tasks you pass, the more likely you are to be a real human.
verification.task_info: Human verification tasks are currently open up to level 3, and you will go through familiar verification methods in everyday life to prove you are not a robot. This process is only used for identity or device recognition and will not retain your personal information.
verification.requirement: Complete at least level 2 to get your DNA NFT free minting.
